meanings.sent1: The discloser shared the secret with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The discloser revealed the truth about the situation.
meanings.sent3: The discloser accidentally spilled the beans during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was a discloser of stories, always unveiling new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The discloser's honesty made them a trusted source of information.

meanings.definition: The act of disclosing or revealing information.
meanings.sent1: The discloser of the news caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent2: The discloser of the document was praised for their transparency.
meanings.sent3: The discloser of the surprise party almost ruined the secret.
meanings.sent4: The discloser of the treasure map led us on an exciting adventure.
meanings.sent5: The discloser of the recipe made everyone's mouths water.
